mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM RCM_FORMALASSESSMENT_INFO RFI WHERE 1=1
AND RFI.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN to_date('${createDate} 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('${createDate} 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND RFI.PROJECTNAME LIKE '%${projectName}%'
AND RFI.BUSINESSID LIKE '%${businessId}%'

SELECT * FROM RCM_PRE_INFO RPI WHERE 1=1
AND RPI.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN to_date('${createDate} 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('${createDate} 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND RPI.PROJECTNAME LIKE '%${projectName}%'
AND RPI.BUSINESSID LIKE '%${businessId}%'

SELECT * FROM RCM_BULLETIN_INFO RBI WHERE 1=1
AND RBI.CREATETIME BETWEEN to_date('${createDate} 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date('${createDate} 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND RBI.PROJECTNAME LIKE '%${projectName}%'
AND RBI.BUSINESSID LIKE '%${businessId}%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FI.BUSINESS_ID as "BUSINESSID", nvl(FI.PROJECT_NAME, fi.BULLETINNAME) as "PROJECTNAME", fi.PROJECT_TYPE as "PROJECT_TYPE", fi.PERTAINAREA_NAME as "PERTAINAREANAME", fi.INVESTMENT_MANAGER_NAME as "INVESTMENTNAME", fi.REVIEW_PERSON as "REVIEWPERSONNAME", fi.LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON as "LEGALREVIEWPERSONNAME", FI.MEETING_TIME as "MEETING_TIME", FI.WF_STATE, FI.STAGE, fi.MEETING_LEADERS as "MEETING_LEADERS", fi.MEETINGLEADERS as "MEETING_LEADERS_C", fi.DECISIONRESULT as "DECISION_RESULT", fi.VOTING_RESULTS as "VOTING_RESULTS" FROM rcm_v_report_data FI ) T WHERE 1 = 1 and t.DECISION_RESULT is not null AND T.WF_STATE <> '0' and T.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and T.PERTAINAREANAME like '%${pertainareaName}%' and T.WF_STATE in (${wf_state}) and T.INVESTMENTNAME like '%${investmentName}%' and T.REVIEWPERSONNAME like '%${reviewPersonName}%' and T.LEGALREVIEWPERSONNAME like '%${legalReviewPersonName}%' and T.STAGE = '${stage}'
and to_date(to_char(T.MEETING_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_date('${applyDateStart}','yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_date(to_char(T.MEETING_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_date('${applyDateEnd}','yyyy-MM-dd')
and instr(T.MEETING_LEADERS, '${meetingLeader}') > 0
ORDER BY T.MEETING_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT FI.BUSINESS_ID as "BUSINESSID", nvl(FI.PROJECT_NAME, fi.BULLETINNAME) as "PROJECTNAME", fi.PROJECT_TYPE as "PROJECT_TYPE", fi.PERTAINAREA_NAME as "PERTAINAREANAME", fi.INVESTMENT_MANAGER_NAME as "INVESTMENTNAME", fi.REVIEW_PERSON as "REVIEWPERSONNAME", fi.LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON as "LEGALREVIEWPERSONNAME", FI.MEETING_TIME as "MEETING_TIME", FI.WF_STATE, FI.STAGE, fi.MEETING_LEADERS as "MEETING_LEADERS", fi.MEETINGLEADERS as "MEETING_LEADERS_C", fi.DECISIONRESULT as "DECISION_RESULT", fi.VOTING_RESULTS as "VOTING_RESULTS" FROM rcm_v_report_data FI ) T WHERE 1 = 1 and t.DECISION_RESULT is not null AND T.WF_STATE <> '0' and T.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%' and T.PERTAINAREANAME like '%${pertainareaName}%' and T.WF_STATE in (${wf_state}) and T.INVESTMENTNAME like '%${investmentName}%' and T.REVIEWPERSONNAME like '%${reviewPersonName}%' and T.LEGALREVIEWPERSONNAME like '%${legalReviewPersonName}%' and T.STAGE = '${stage}'
and to_date(to_char(T.MEETING_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_date('${applyDateStart}','yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_date(to_char(T.MEETING_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_date('${applyDateEnd}','yyyy-MM-dd')
and instr(T.MEETING_LEADERS, '${meetingLeader}') > 0
ORDER BY T.MEETING_TIME DESC
